snippet: Why was the Higgs boson so expensive? Well, there’s the tanning salon bill for those Ph.D.’s who spent all their time in a tunnel.
abstract: Loose Ends column by Christopher Buckley humorously attempts to explain the importance of the Higgs boson particle.
lead_paragraph: Why was the Higgs boson so expensive? Well, there’s the tanning salon bill for those Ph.D.’s who spent all their time in a tunnel.

headline.print_headline: Q. and A.: The Higgs Boson and You
headline.seo: Q. and A.: The Higgs Boson and You
headline.main: Q. and A.: The Higgs Boson and You
